title: Pixel 3 after July Android Update - bootloop
content:
After July 2020 Android update my Pixel has few times entered into boot loop. This boot loop is ending after few minutes. Phone is getting very warm during this time.
Never happened before. Since update it happened 3 times. It recovered by itself all 3 times.

Whats goin on?

My IMEI: 990012004514789
